Author: noi2coco, Kusane
Description: After each solve, enter the correct color sequence using the leds and the flashing buttons. When all modules have been solved, enter a final sequence using previous answers. Tags: blinking, colors, red, green, blue, orange, cyan, purple, magenta, yellow, pink, white
Name: Simon Forgets

TwitchPlays.ScoreExplanation: This module awards 2 point per correct input plus 3 points for every module on the bomb upon solving.
